channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I inherited $200,000. One of my daughters is married with kids, but the other has debts. Do I split my windfall 50/50?
item.description: “She has incurred a lot of debt due to the financial strain of a sick pet, a car loan, student loans and an unpaid military home loan.”

item.title: RFK Jr.'s website is crowdsourcing Trump appointee suggestions
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s "Make America Healthy" website is seeking recommendations for appointees "across the future Trump administration."

item.title: Business leaders weigh the U.S.' role in climate policy as Trump transitions to White House
item.description: Business leaders at the U.N. climate conference weighed the outlook for U.S. climate policy, as Washington transitions to Donald Trump's second term.

item.title: ‘I’ve no interest in investing more money in the stock market’: I’m debt-free, retired and ignoring the ‘Trump bump.’ What should I do with $400,000?
item.description: “I already have $1.5 million in the stock market.”

item.title: This is what history shows after big stock-market jumps like this one

item.title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
item.description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock pops 25% after company reports strong revenue growth, first Neutron deal
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in post-market trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Trump picks Fox News host and Army National Guard veteran Pete Hegseth for defense secretary
item.description: In his announcement, Trump called Hegseth “tough, smart and a true believer in America First.”

item.title: Trump says Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy will head a new ‘Department of Government Efficiency’
item.description: Trump made the announcement on social media, fulfilling a campaign promise to give Musk sweeping oversight of federal spending.

item.title: Australia plans to ban social media for under 16s — and experts have called it a ‘momentous step’
item.description: One expert says Australia is "on the verge of reclaiming childhood after it had been stolen for 15 years."

item.title: My grandmother gave her neighbor $6,000 to buy a car. There was no car. How can I protect her from further exploitation?
item.description: “The neighbor is living it up and — lo and behold! — there is no vehicle.”
